title: [Necropolis, Narthex]
description: An overturned sarcophagus lies along the western wall, its tenant spilling out onto the dusty stone floor.  Strips of cloth extend from the skeleton, as if small scavengers tried to make off with it.  The skeleton's mandible lies several feet away from its outstretched arm.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, east, southeast, south
